paragraphs: In this letter, the symbol <Name> has been substituted for the  player character's name.
By the Grace of ALMSIVI, Lords and Rulers of All
Know all Dunmer by these words that I, Hlaalu <Name>, have legally  purchased the land of Rethan Manor on the northeast coast of the River  Odai south of Balmora. Witness my hand below.

Seal of the seller
Baren Alen, Treasurer of the Great House Hlaalu
